Amazon is still offering the entry-level 16GB/1TB M5 MacBook Pro down at the $1,349 low, but we wanted to highlight this$250 price drop on this 24GB model at B&H today as well. Amazon doesn’t offer this configuration at all, leaving B&H’s offer the lowest price around for Apple’s new M5 MacBook Pro with 24GB of RAM.

items.title: Boston-based Neurable, which builds an OS for brain-computer interfaces, raised a $35M Series A led by Spectrum Moonshot Fund, bringing its total raised to $65M (Brock E.W. Turner/Axios)
items.summary:
Brock E.W. Turner / Axios:
Boston-based Neurable, which builds an OS for brain-computer interfaces, raised a $35M Series A led by Spectrum Moonshot Fund, bringing its total raised to $65M  —  Neurable, a neurotechnology company, raised a $35 million Series A round led by the Spectrum Moonshot Fund, CEO Ramses Alcaide tells Axios Pro exclusively.

items.title: Save $390 while upgrading to Autel’s MaxiCharger AC Pro level 2 EV charger with up to 80A output at $909
items.summary:
Today, Autel’s official Amazon storefront is offering its MaxiCharger AC Pro 80A Level 2 EV Charger at $909 shipped, which beats out the brand’s direct pricing by $160. This is the latest charging solution for your electric vehicle from the brand, with it having hit the market back in May, but not having seen any discounts until late July and then in August, when it fell to the $899 low before keeping between $1,299 and $1,069 until last month. We saw this rate appear and hold out through Black Friday and Cyber Monday, with it coming back around for a second chance at the second-best pricing we have tracked, letting you significantly upgrade your home EV charging setup with $390 savings.

more…

The holiday iOS game and app deals continue on the App Store with another sizable batch of top-tier titles added to the list today. From Little Nightmares and Backflip Madness 2 to World’s End Club, LEGO Bricktales, and Moncage, there’s a whole bunch of new deals up for grabs today. Just be sure to go check out the return all-time low on AirPods Pro 3 while you still can as well as MacBook Air deals at $250 off, this rare deal on Apple’s latest USB-C Magic Mouse, the current-gen iPad 11 from $274, and the black Apple Watch Ultra 2 with the matching Milanese Loop at $250 off. But for now it’s all about the apps and all of this week’s best are waiting below.

items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Logitech’s MX Creative Console down to $159.99 shipped. The deals on this 9-key controller have been very light for the most part since its debut last year carrying a $200 price tag, and today’s deal takes $40 off its usual going rate. It first dropped to this price during the fall Prime Day sale, and today’s deal marks the return of that price with a 20% discount. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this controller, and you’ll find both black and white variants down at $160 today. Head below for more details.

items.summary:

This Intel-powered laptop typically goes for $900, so you’re looking at a straight-up $400 discount on it right now. The 14-inch variant of this notebook saw a $400 discount earlier this year during the retailer’s Labor Day sale, but this is the first time we’re seeing this 16-inch model drop this low. items.title: A Starlink satellite seems to have exploded
items.summary: SpaceX says it has lost control of a Starlink satellite that's now falling back to Earth after suffering an anomaly. The sudden loss of communications, drop in altitude, "venting of the propulsion tank," and "release of a small number of trackable low relative velocity objects," suggests the anomaly was some kind of explosion. SpaceX says […]

items.title: E-Hailing Drivers Clocking Over 2,000km Monthly Eligible For BUDI95 Quota Increase
items.summary:
E-hailing drivers who travel less than 2,000km a month will no longer qualify for additional subsidised petrol under the BUDI95 scheme, according to a report by New Straits Times (NST). The policy applies to Malaysian citizens with valid driving licences and aims to better target subsidies towards active full-time drivers. Finance Minister II Datuk Seri […]
